an3.108:1: "Tiṇṇaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭisevanāya natthi titti. Katamesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ? Soppassa, bhikkhave, paṭisevanāya natthi titti. Surāmerayapānassa, bhikkhave, paṭisevanāya natthi titti. Methunadhammasamāpattiyā, bhikkhave, paṭisevanāya natthi titti. Imesaṁ, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ paṭisevanāya natthi tittī"ti.
